templates.expansion: A blazing sphere of crimson fire streaks forward and erupts on impact, igniting enemies in the blast radius with burning damage over time and heavy upfront impact.
A broad shimmering wall sweeps across the lane, forcing enemies back, disrupting their advance, and dealing sustained contact damage to units caught in its path.
A circular burst of blue frost blooms across the battlefield, chilling enemies inside its reach, slowing movement speed, and applying freezing control pressure.
A crackling storm bolt lashes from target to target, arcing electric damage through clustered enemies while applying a brief slowing shock effect.
A burning meteor tears through the sky and slams into the battlefield, creating a massive fiery impact zone that deals high burst damage and leaves scorched ground that continues to burn enemies.
A violent seismic pulse fractures the lane in a widening shockwave, knocking enemies off balance, dealing heavy earth damage, and briefly stunning tightly packed front lines.
A swirling arcane vortex opens at target position, dragging nearby enemies inward while dealing sustained magical damage and compressing groups into a vulnerable cluster.
A focused lance of searing sunlight pierces straight through a lane, dealing piercing radiant damage to enemies in a long line and applying a brief burn to survivors.
A roaming blizzard cloud sweeps over enemy lanes, pelting units with freezing shards that slow movement severely, stack chill effects, and occasionally freeze weaker targets in place.
An unstable mix of shadow and flame erupts in smoky black-red bursts, inflicting both immediate fire damage and lingering arcane corruption that weakens enemy resilience.
A towering wall of enchanted water crashes down the lane, sweeping enemies backward, dealing repeated impact damage, and drenching targets to amplify follow-up storm effects.
A field of razor-thorn vines erupts from the ground, rooting and slowing advancing enemies while dealing constant puncture damage to anything trying to push through.
A blazing phoenix silhouette dives into enemy ranks, detonating in a ring of rebirth fire that deals explosive damage, ignites targets, and briefly clears space near the impact point.
A cylindrical cage of rotating lightning forms around a target cluster, trapping enemies inside while chaining electric arcs that deal repeated damage and slow escape attempts.
A warped temporal field blooms over the lane, dramatically reducing enemy movement and attack cadence while dealing low steady arcane damage as time pressure crushes trapped units.
A cloud of razor crystal shards refracts and ricochets through enemies, dealing repeated arcane-piercing hits and scattering damage across tightly grouped formations.
A crimson lunar curse settles over the battlefield, marking enemies with a damage-amplifying hex that increases incoming spell damage and punishes clustered targets over time.
A cone of molten dragonfire roars forward in a sweeping stream, scorching a wide front arc with intense burn damage and pushing lighter enemies back from the blast.
Ancient runes flare into a circular prison of void energy, binding clustered enemies in place while electric silence and tremoring shocks crack over them.
A lattice of radiant glyph sigils locks onto enemy signatures, chaining burst-light between them and amplifying vulnerability through arcane resonance.
A bright holy detonation erupts in brilliant concentric rings, burning wicked targets while briefly stunning nearby enemies and scattering weak lines of force.
A roaring vortex of ember fire sweeps forward as a twisting cyclone, burning everything in its path and shoving enemies outward with repeated knockback pulses.
Hundreds of razor-edged crystal motes spiral through the air and ricochet across lanes, fragmenting damage across dense enemy groups.
A spinning, high-voltage maelstrom forms above the lane and tears through enemies in a sweeping storm path with shock-chain arcs and crushing slow-down pressure.
A dark moon-sigil eclipses the battlefield in chilled shadow-fire, layering burn and frost pressure while suppressing enemy coordination.
A vault of crystalline frost and sharp wind rises from the ground, immobilizing front-line enemies while pummeling them with freezing projectiles from above.
A wave of burning impact points races down the lane in staggered timing, chaining explosion pressure and staggering survivors with repeated concussion pushes.
A reflective lunar ward deploys with radiant mirrors that blind and stagger incoming lines, then collapses into a delayed burst at the end of its hold.
A line-piercing gale-lance cuts across the lane at commander angle, channeling air pressure with repeated impact pulses and piercing follow-up arcs.
A black-fire brand marks enemies with unstable curse energy, increasing subsequent spell damage and causing stacked recoil when clustered.
A spectral comet punches through the skies and detonates on impact, shredding formations with burning arcane shock and leaving a crumbling gravity pocket behind it.
A luminous spear of cold fire and lightning tears down a straight lane, blending piercing electric and frost damage while destabilizing enemy lines.
A wall of enchanted ferro-mist floods forward as armored fragments and pressure, pinning enemies in place while each step drives them farther from their footing.
A chain of cursed apparitions lashes between enemies, dragging and stunning survivors while phantom flames eat away at clustered defenses.
A monumental cathedral of mirrored ice manifests mid-lane, trapping enemies beneath a ringing dome while repeated shards fracture and chill everything that moves.
A hammering sun-metal sigil crashes down and ignites a radiant circle, hardening nearby air into burning plates that punish sustained presence.
A crackling crucible forms as lightning and gusts collide, cycling burst arcs and grinding enemies under a rotating storm cage.
Dark glass hailstones rain from the void-touched sky, each shard piercing and fragmenting on contact to layer crowd-control pressure across the lane.
A nauseating fog of rot and static settles low over the front lane, dulling responses and weakening armor while enemy marks persist in the cloud.
Stars align into a geometric prison around clustered foes, locking their movement while starlight jabs and electric dissonance batter trapped targets.
A deadened eclipse rolls over the lane, muting defenses and layering cold shadow with punishing burst at the center of clustered resistance.
A fiery labyrinth of collapsing corridors spins into existence, forcing enemies to churn through burning walls while recursive embers strike from every angle.
A rapid triple-burst of glowing arcane orbs streaks toward enemies in quick succession, each mote trailing holy light and detonating in a flash of violet energy on impact.
A tangle of thorny magical vines erupts from the ground, rooting enemies in place while dealing sustained puncture damage and slowing any that break free from the creeping growth.
